comment:
Had a great last semester learning Astronomy together ✌️.
All the best man. Hope you reach those stars.
name: Jaisurya

comment: Let's do something or Let's go somewhere anagaane the first person to tag along is you and I can never be grateful enough for your company. You made each college memory fun with your weird wits and crazy dance moves. And stop stalking me dude, 5th class nunchi venaka padi unnav same class lo 😂.
name: Tadi Dinesh Kumar Reddy

comment:
Mama... Always the person I look out for any trips or outings... 😌
Eppudu ayna annitiki ready. Bayatiki veldham ante chaalu sare ani mudhuki vasthav... 
Late night inka exams mundhu COD ki eppudu ready. Will miss those games and chats with you.
ATB for your future and eppudu touch lo undham... 😉
name: Siddartha Chennareddy

comment: Made me a football pundit, wasting countless hours watching matches and races together, but those were some of the best moments of college life. Became the best football partner(seriously work on ur finishing). Endless debates on random stuff. I hope we never get to agree on anything.
name: Sahas
